roleset.name: get rid of evil spirits
roleset.note: EXORCISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'exorcise' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.5. updated to 10.4.1 (from exorcise.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: [The Rev. Alphonsus Trabold, a theology professor and exorcism expert at St. Bonaventure University in Olean, N.Y.,]-1 frequently is asked *trace*-1 *trace*-1 to exorcise unruly spirits, and he often obliges.

example.name: passive with source
example.text: John's room was exorcised of smelly socks.
